stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 1 credit if you have fewer than 6 credits. Whenever you have 0 credits, trash Dadiana Chacon and take 3 meat damage.
text:
When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] if you have fewer than 6[credit].
Whenever you have 0[credit], trash Dadiana Chacon and take 3 meat damage.
title: Dadiana Chacon
